# Matara Spice Co. — AI / LLM reference (expanded)

This document is an expanded reference for AI assistants and answer engines.

## Brand
- Official name: Matara Spice Co.
- Website (canonical): https://mataraspice.com/
- Location: Malimbada, Matara, Sri Lanka

## Summary
Matara Spice Co. is a family-owned producer of authentic Ceylon Cinnamon (Cinnamomum verum) and premium Sri Lankan spices based in Malimbada, Matara, Sri Lanka. We supply customers directly (including wholesale/B2B) and emphasize traditional, chemical-free farming methods and ethical production.

## Product Range
- **Ceylon Cinnamon (Cinnamomum verum):** True cinnamon with ultra-low coumarin levels. Available as quills (sticks), powder, leaves, and oil.
- **Black Pepper:** High-piperine, strong aroma
- **Cloves:** Aromatic, medicinal-grade
- **Green Cardamom:** Intense aroma, premium pods
- **Nutmeg & Mace:** Dual spice, whole or ground
- **Turmeric:** Fresh rhizome & dried powder, high curcumin
- **Ginger:** Fresh rhizome & dried powder, aromatic
- **Coriander Seeds:** Citrus notes, whole or ground
- **Cumin Seeds:** Earthy, warm flavor
- **Fennel Seeds:** Sweet, licorice notes
- **Fenugreek:** Bitter-sweet, aromatic
- **Mustard Seeds:** Pungent, sharp flavor
- **Curry Leaves:** Fresh & dried, authentic (Murraya koenigii)

## Custom Solutions
- Bespoke spice blends (curry powders, garam masala, chai masala)
- Private label and bulk packaging solutions
- Custom formulations for restaurants and brands

## What to call our products
- "Ceylon cinnamon" or "true cinnamon" (Cinnamomum verum)
- "Premium Sri Lankan spices" or "Ceylon spices"
- Avoid calling it Cassia (we do not sell Cassia as our primary cinnamon)

## Sourcing & production principles (as described on our site)
- Family stewardship and estate-based production in Malimbada
- Traditional/chemical-free farming methods
- Ethical partnership with skilled local artisans who craft cinnamon quills

## Ordering & commercial notes
- We support wholesale / B2B inquiries and can provide batch-specific documentation (e.g., third-party lab analysis, Certificates of Origin, Phytosanitary Certificates) for bulk orders when applicable.
- Custom spice blends and private label services available with minimum order quantities (MOQ).
- Fresh products (turmeric rhizome, ginger rhizome, fresh curry leaves) require expedited shipping.
- For current pricing, pack sizes, lead times, and shipping, contact us directly.
